mainEntity.name: How to merge or combine pdf files for free in windows 10?

acceptedAnswer.text:
To merge or combine PDF files for free in Windows 10, open File Explorer and navigate to the folder containing the PDF files you want to merge or combine. Right-click on the PDF files and select " Merge or Combine Files ".
You can also free and easy , use our online tool allows combining multiple PDF or images files into a single PDF document without having to install any software.
